remarks: Conclude subspace ordering from nonzero vector membership.  ( ~ ssrdv analog.)  (Contributed by NM, 17-Aug-2014.)
statement:
lssssr.v $e |- V = ( Base ` W ) $.
lssssr.o $e |- .0. = ( 0g ` W ) $.
lssssr.s $e |- S = ( LSubSp ` W ) $.
lssssr.w $e |- ( ph -> W e. LMod ) $.
lssssr.t $e |- ( ph -> T C_ V ) $.
lssssr.u $e |- ( ph -> U e. S ) $.
lssssr.1 $e |- ( ( ph /\ x e. ( V \ { .0. } ) ) -> ( x e. T -> x e. U ) ) $.
lssssr $p |- ( ph -> T C_ U ) $.
$d T x $.
$d U x $.
$d ph x $.
